body:
@Filthy Dweeb why would he be humble ? He gets to tap any and every resource around so obviously he would be egoistical .Your wish is a role fulfilment for her which sounds absurd if one goes by this story.

The plot is rather rancid & stupid.How will you have a lower class if the lower class doesnt copulate altogether ?
The transition of the switch was too handled in haste.The girl was in peace with the law from the start.That feels weird if you do have a love interest.
But i guess cant expect much from a single installement.
For once it's an NTR that the "Victim" beta male that lost not due to dick size, but because he said the wrong thing at the wrong time and drove her away for good.

Imagine if the girls the 'high class' guys had sex with started giving birth to still births or babies with deformities or the child population kept going lower because only a very small minority was having sex. Hell if more girls were born instead of boys, who thinks the law would change real quick?

nice art 
i wish there is part 2 or more
I’d be with the homie
life lesson: if you pissed about something don't take out on the girl you love, it'll just drive her away
Man this was some trash
anjing lah
This is so hilarious damn she is a slut

@Kami Nana - I'm sorry but I find a contradiction to your words! From this line "@Sher(Leg)lock Holmes He's not even a "Chad", just a manipulative asshole in a world full of idiots. He's the one eyed man in a world full of blind people. The MC wasn't even a beta, just put in an impossible situation that made him powerless(as it would have anyone...that's what laws do...especially if they're actually unjust)." You just said it that the dude who love her doesn't have a choice. That also apply to her as well. The law literally enforced all girls to be pregnant by any man with high class semen. She fall in love with his DICK not his personality. In fact she will have to either way cause law making sure she have to be impregnated by him or any other high class semen donor. So let me cut your word with THAT!
Kami Nana sounds like he's never EVER had a lover before, or anyone to call an SO. Get a life and go out more often, your virginity reeks :)

Omg she was a fucking slut and I feel bad for the guy, she never cared about him at all, they was childhood friends and she just threw away to become someone slut, but I laugh in the end with the villain lmao
Lmao what even is this
@Kami Nana you sound like an incel.

I don’t feel too horrible about this one. I mean yeah sure the childhood sweethearts got ripped apart but looking at it the other way. It only took one day and a few sex sessions for this dude to destroy her “love” for the other guy, if it was that brittle to start then it would’ve only been a matter of time before she got NTRed away anyways so sucks for dude but at least he can try to move on now.

@Filthy Dweeb lol No. His so called childhood friend was already long gone before that point...it was just an excuse for her to throw him away. How the guy felt and reacted to the fucked up situation was completely normal. The one that was stupid for not understanding was said so called childhood "friend". She didn't even consider how he'd feel seeing it happen...she clearly never actually cared for him as much as she claimed...or the author just doesn't understand psychology...
@vienna12 The asshole isn't the MC, he's the antagonist, the villain... :/

@cherry1600 Exactly! Nice to see someone gets it! Just shows that girl didn't really care for him...even though she tries to claim only she loved the other. If she really did, she wouldn't have thrown him away so easily or given in to the rich, manipulative asswipe.

@Sher(Leg)lock Holmes He's not even a "Chad", just a manipulative asshole in a world full of idiots. He's the one eyed man in a world full of blind people. The MC wasn't even a beta, just put in an impossible situation that made him powerless(as it would have anyone...that's what laws do...especially if they're actually unjust).

lol She was an idiot... Really saying she was the only one that loved the other? When she's the one that let go so ridiculously easy? Just goes to show NTR needs weak women to "work"...and shows they never actually loved the MC, either. So, MC should just move on and find a good girl that has a strong mind...though, I'm not sure they exist in NTR worlds as the author doesn't seem to understand human thought processes very well.
It would be better if that guy have something other than a bowl cut

Oh... well... this is a garbage... the childhood friend shouldn't care her anymore, because she is already a slut from the beginning. if she care about her childhood friend, she should resist the pleasure or at least express a displeasure during sex til the end, but she already enjoying the sex from the beginning and she already belong to the street. And the ending is... Meh...typical NTR story.. predictable and not special
is this guy an alien or something? i don't get the ending
that drama part is so dumb it gave me flashback to late 2000s porn lol
Wow this doujins fking punch me in the dick
and can someone please recommend some good NTR shit? XD

personally i love NTR and this is some good shit. and come on don't blame the guy. its the girls fault that the mc acted that way even if i am in his shoes i might act that way as well . if she truly liked/loved the mc then she should least try to put some effort to hold that moan.

an interesting way to handle this type of stories. Its not like highschool dropout but if High level citizen have to mate with random people why bother having relationship in the first place its like Koi To Uso.
This was sooooooo hot
Fuck this is so good i need more of these.
the fuck of these Japanese authors and this drama that they want to put the hentai, if he removed all the pages that have flashback it would give another 20 sex pages
this is surprisingly good

For a NTR the story was different but i'd rather have the girl just get mindfucked or some of the other generic plot line cus this was reaching a bit and felt really stupid (that kid doesn't even look like he got superior genes manlet,jap,still in HS, might as well made him black lol) . okay art lazy story.

Awful art, page 39 being the worst lol, this one it's generic only liked the high rank guy following the rythm of the bat training, the story it's weird I get that high rank can get any girl, but if low rank males can't have sex they would lose it, you would have a revolution there.

The ending was also weird, ¿who's that guy supposed to be?,  ¿some demon?  because I doubt a President would take a suggestion of a kid.

I give this a 1/10.
Evil laugh at the end got me XD

Real smart President, narrowing Japan's gene pool even more. The guy at the end even said the whole thing was BS.
Not talking about the ntr but i don't think author know how politic works. U can't make up random laws and apply it like that even if you are the president (congress, voting,...)
I think I'm not gonna read this cuz my PTSD will kick in again so bye bye and ty guys for telling me at the bottom that this sad so ty again bye
this is top tier, but can we get less focus on the cuck and more on the actual chad. we dont need to see the beta male too much
this made me more sad than horny
in ntr doujins artists are giving too much attention to cucked boyfriends/friends, it's anticlimatic and frustrating how they are standing there doing nothnig

@Vjakfu It's not really explained outside of the fact that he seems to be someone extremely wealthy and then he somehow convinced the president that if they passed this law they'd be able to fuck/impregnate anyone they wanted. Since only the high class males are allowed to have sex with low class females (which is implied to be pretty much every female) while low class males are not allowed to have sex with anyone.

@Lovemesenpai I think the part where pretty much everyone is told what to do by the government + AI and the fact that the high class man knows how to manipulate her into falling for him even though she at first hated it and loved her childhood friend. So it's not as much mind control as it is manipulation.
I don't get it, how did he make the president pass that law ?
i dont see any mind control, i must be really blind
this is what happen if Nazi had won lmao
So This is Koi to uso but the love interest gets stolen ? SWEET and The guy is rich so the girl really is lucky Since She will be be really rich now as well
Are niggas really getting genuine depression because of a porno?  How do you all even live kek

For those that are sad reading NTR doujins. Please don't be sad :) cure yourself from the sadness by reading some good ol' vanilla doujins. I know how you guys feel, it is the same as me before it almost gave me depression and made me question life but tbh, let's face reality. First, this is a work of fiction. It ain't real. Second, before we even started reading doujins Cheating and NTR is already a thing even in pornos so don't be sad guys. Plus some of the NTR has the same plot (weak/asshole mc gets cucked) so when you're used to reading NTR it ain't that bad. Cheer Up to those that are sad right now :)

takahiro couldn’t have done anything differently here. the laws fucked him over and he had to witness his childhood friend get fucked over and over. anyone would’ve gotten upset. he let his emotions out just ONE time and it was over for him.

sad story but decent doujin

Man I don't mind ntr but this is depressing -_- it felt so bad

He got too emotional and didnt look past himself when considering what was wrong. All he had to do was keep a cool head, but her couldn't even do that, and look where that got him. Now his childhood friend that he had feelings for is far gone. Something tells me he'll end up at Tokyo bay just becuase he cant keep himself in check when investigating that outrageous law. Now on the other hand props to our "dick" of this hentai, absolutely, without a doubt one of my favorite manipulators in any hentai, though that isn't saying much. He's still a fine character nevertheless. If I had one problem it'd be the ending page, they could've made him mor humble. Overall? Maybe 8/10 Art was pretty great.
